remarks: Lemma for ~ axsegcon .  Show that the square of the distance between two points is a real number.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Sep-2013.)
statement:
axsegconlem2.1 $e |- S = sum_ p e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( ( A ` p ) - ( B ` p ) ) ^ 2 ) $.
axsegconlem2 $p |- ( ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) -> S e. RR ) $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d N p $.
